short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: Effortlessly clean your browsing history with customizable options.
short.de: Bereinigen Sie mühelos Ihren Browserverlauf mit anpassbaren Optionen.
short.es: Limpie sin esfuerzo su historial de navegación con opciones personalizables.
short.fr: Nettoyez sans effort votre historique de navigation avec des options personnalisables.
short.tr: Özelleştirilebilir seçeneklerle tarama geçmişinizi zahmetsizce temizleyin.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
CleanSlate - Custom History Cleaner

CleanSlate is your go-to Chrome extension for efficient and customizable browsing history management. Key features include:

## Features

• Auto History Wipe: Set up daily, weekly, or monthly auto-clean schedules.
• Custom Exceptions: Easily add websites you want to exclude from cleaning.
• Flexible Options: Choose what types of data to remove (history, cookies, cache).
• Secure Backup: Safely export and import your cleaning preferences.

Take control of your digital footprint with CleanSlate - the smart way to keep your browsing history tidy and your privacy intact.

## How to use

1. Click on the CleanSlate icon in your Chrome toolbar to open the extension popup.

2. Select the time range for which you want to clear browsing data:
   - Last Hour
   - Last 24 Hours
   - Last Week
   - Custom Range (allows you to set specific start and end dates)

3. Choose which types of data you want to clear:
   - Browsing History
   - Cookies
   - Cache
   - Downloads
   - Form Data

4. Click the "Clean" button to start the cleaning process.

5. For advanced settings, click on "Advanced Settings" to:
   - Set up automatic cleaning schedules
   - Add exceptions for websites you never want to be cleared
   - Create and manage different cleaning profiles
   - Set up password protection for the extension
   - Backup and restore your settings

6. After cleaning, a summary of cleared data will be displayed.

Note: Always be cautious when clearing browsing data, as it may sign you out of websites and remove saved preferences.
